segments.text: Excuse me , but I'm looking for a gift for my friend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it a Chinese New Year's gift or a birthday gift ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . Let me guess ... something sexy for the new bride on her first night of marriage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Basically . But I have no idea what to get ! She's American and kind of ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well-endowed ? Don't worry . I have some bras with bigger cup sizes in the back .
segments.speaker: S2
